"MISSION: Decision":
"アークスの訓練用プログラム、第二弾です。
舞台は凍土、地下坑道、浮遊大陸となり
支援物資かチャレンジマイルのどちらかを
選択し、クリアを目指していただきます。

初期装備や所持品は一切なく、全てが
現地調達となります。ご注意ください。
――――――――――――――――――――
Objective / Clear 5 missions.
※There is no Mission 6 or higher."

"The challenge will begin shortly.
Clear five missions before
running out of VR energy."
"Your inventory will rely on on-site procurement. This is an intense training exercise in which you must play adapt on the fly. Good luck!"

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi07_013 This is Mission 1.
First collect the items from the containers
and defeat the enemies."

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi07_014 In Mission 2, darkness will occur at regular intervals.
There seems to be some relation to the movement of
the spiked floor and the darkness."

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi07_016 This is Mission 4. In this area,
energy capsules are available
only in D-2 and A-2."

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi07_017 This is Mission 5.
This is the final mission.
Push yourself to the limit!"
